segments.text: Good morning , Janice . Our office will hold a welcoming party in the evening , so I will allocate you some assignment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . I will find someone to assist you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . What can I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Firstly , you should go to the supermarket , which is nearest to our company , to buy some fruit , drinks , desserts and cakes . Here is the list of things you need to buy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I can do it . And then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The meeting room on the Fourth Floor needs to be swept . Jerry and Tom will help you at that time . Any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who will pay for these things ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about that . I have already calculated the money about things you will buy . Remember to give me the receipt when you come back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will go in no time .
segments.speaker: S2
